titleStmt.title: Prothalamion or A spousall verse made by Edm. Spenser. In honour of the double mariage of the two honorable & vertuous ladies, the Ladie Elizabeth and the Ladie Katherine Somerset, daughters to the Right Honourable the Earle of Worcester and espoused to the two worthie gentlemen M. Henry Gilford, and M. William Peter Esquyers
titleStmt.author: Spenser, Edmund, 1552?-1599.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Orwin] for VVilliam Ponsonby,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
